title: failure document
text:
flowchart LR
    A([Start]) --> B{Boolean Condition}
    B -->|Yes| C[[unterprogram]]
    B -->|No| D[subblockB]
    C --> E[/"Ein/Ausgabe"/]
    D --> E[/"Ein/Ausgabe"/]
    E --> F([End])






This file will refuse to compile to pdf; as it contains the above mermaid-block. Adding the render-target pdf as declared above yields this log/error:

title: compile info
text:
Notes:

final compilation was performed on linux
the windows-data was rendered beforehand, and can be found unaltered under /windows_compiled_targets/
the renv lockfile holds the project package state used for the linux-sided compilation of the documents.
